trans-unit.source: The backend is currently offline! Please contact support@midata.coop if the problem persists.
An internal error occured. Please contact support@midata.coop if the problem persists.
An internal database error occured. Please contact support@midata.coop if the problem persists.
No active consent that allows to add data for target person.

In order to use this feature you need to complete your registration. Request a written copy of the AGB and return it signed. You will also receive a confirmation code to verify your postal address. If you want to check your account status click on your username on the top right and check the 'Account Status' section.
In order to use this feature you must be member of the MIDATA cooperative. Click on your username on the top right and check the 'Account Status' section for more information.
You are not authorized to do this action
You are not authorized to query the provided fields
You are not authorized to access this account
You are not authorized to access this study
Please enter a valid email address
Invalid email address or password. You are trying to log in as account holder. Are you
Password and password repetition do not match!
Passphrase and passphrase repetition do not match!
Enter a valid day of month (1 - 31)
Field must be of type string
Plugin is intended for a different role
The Data Access Filter must restrict by 'content' or 'group'!
The Data Access Filter contains data types that are excluded by the study configuration.
Study can only be anonymous if no one is allowed to access unpseudonymized data.
Please provide your email address and password.
Please fill out your email address.
Please fill out this input field.
Participant must first be assigned to a group.
The requested space does no longer exist.
Record Content-Type is not registered with the platform.
A person with this email is already registered.
A person with this email is already registered.
A healthcare provider with this name already exists.
A research organisation with this name already exists.
A plugin with the same name already exists.
A study with this name already exists.
User is not allowed to log in. Contact support@midata.coop for help.
Too many bad login attempts. Wait 1 minute before next attempt.
Too many bad login attempts. Wait 5 minutes before next attempt.
Too many bad login attempts. Wait 1 hour before next attempt.
Account holder is not allowed to participate in study.
The consent for using this app has been revoked. To reenable the app, delete the rejected or expired consent on the MIDATA portal.
You are allowed to use this app on a maximum of 10 devices. Please delete unused consents on the MIDATA portal.
Passwords must be at least 8 characters long.
Passphrases must be at least 8 characters long.
Passwords should contain upper/lower case letters, numbers and special characters.
Passphrases should contain upper/lower case letters, numbers and special characters.
This activation token has already expired. Please request a new one.
This activation token has already expired. A new token has been sent to your email address right now. Please confirm your email address within 24 hours using the new token.
Consents for studies may not be altered.
Setup can only be changed as long as study is in draft phase.
Group of participant can only be changed if study is not running or no participant accepted yet.
The file is too large (maximum 1 MB).
User account changed by an administrator
Account holder retreated from study participation
Email address of user must be known to the platform
Email address of user must have been verified
Mobile phone number of user must be known to the platform
Mobile phone number of user must have been verified
Post address of user must be known to the platform
Post address of user must have been verified
ID card of users must have been verified
User must be member of the cooperative
Account must have been unlocked by a MIDATA administrator
Data covered by consent may be written or updated.
Any kind of data may be written using this consent.
Data stored in this MIDATA instance
Choose one of the portal from the top of the page to start. Each portal has its own LOGIN and SIGN UP page.
This is a local installation of the MIDATA platform, only available from your PC.
A local installation may be used in order to contribute to the MIDATA platform and for testing purposes.
You may register user accounts for all four portals. Accounts do not need to be validated by a MIDATA administrator. You may register and use your own admin accounts.
Whenever you run it, its available only for you :-)
Data stored in this instance will only be available on your local PC.
This is a test instance of the MIDATA platform.

This instance may be used to develop and test new apps and plugins for MIDATA in a safe environment. It is also used to test new versions of the portal and the backend before the other instances are updated.
Register your own developer account. After validation by a MIDATA administrator, you may register test users, researchers and health providers without additional validation.

There is no guarantee on availability. Expect updates of the instance to happen as needed. If possible, updates are done between 12:00 and 13:00 central european time, but may occur more than once a day if problems occur.
Store only test data on this instance. Data may be wiped, accounts may be deleted if necessary. Records may become corrupted by bugs. There is no backup of the data.
This is a demonstration instance of the MIDATA platform.
This instance may be used for demonstration purposes and training.
You may register user accounts for all four portals. Accounts must be validated by a MIDATA administrator, before they are unlocked.
This instance is updated less frequently than the test.midata.coop instance. Expected downtime is once a week on Monday between 12:00 and 14:00 central european time.
Store only demonstration data on this instance. There is no backup of the data.
This is the MIDATA platform for Switzerland.
This is the productive MIDATA platform for storing health data in Switzerland.
New user accounts have feature restrictions. Healthprovider, research and development accounts can only be used after validation by MIDATA. Fake or test accounts are not allowed and will be blocked.
This instance is for storing real data about real people. Data is backed up on a daily basis.
Please fill in the required information below (fields marked with an asterisk * are mandatory)
I agree to MIDATA's terms of use
I agree to MIDATA's privacy terms
I agree to the App Terms and Conditions
Enter the email address associated with your account, then click Continue. We'll email you a link to a page where you can easily create a new password.
We have sent you an email with instructions on how to reset your password.
Please enter a new password for your account.
You have successfully set a new password for your account.
Your account is protected with a passphrase.
If you lost your passphrase contact support@midata.coop
Your email address needs to be confirmed. An activation email has been sent to your account. Just click on the link in this email to confirm your email address.
For convenience you may enter the code from the email here:
A contract has been sent to your postal address. Please return it signed to MIDATA.
A MIDATA administrator will verify and unlock your account. You will be notified when your account has been unlocked.
A letter with a confirmation code will be sent to your postal address. Enter this confirmation code to access the platform.
You have provided the confirmation code. You may login after the signed contract has arrived at MIDATA.
Your postal address is required to use this service, please provide it.
A mobile phone number is required to use this service, please provide it.
Your account must be unlocked by a MIDATA administrator. Please retry later. If your account has not been unlocked for more than 24 hours, please contact MIDATA.

A passphrase is an additional protection (additional encryption) for your data. It is not stored on our servers. You have to provide the passphrase on every login, to make it possible to decrypt your data. If you loose your passphrase, you will not be able to access your data anymore!.
If your account is not yet protected by a passphrase leave the field 'Old passphrase' empty.
Please keep your passphrase at a save place, there is no recovery function for it. If you loose your passphrase, you will not be able to access your data anymore!.
By repeating your new passphrase you make the change final.
There are no spotlighted plugins yet.
We have no recommendations for you yet.
Search only healthcare providers you already had contact with.
No visualization available for this record.
Your gender, year of birth and country of residence
Your complete demographic data (name, birthday, address, ...)
May other users find your profile, while searching for your email?
Yes, I want my name and email to be visible to other users
No, I don't want that any other user sees my profile
This setting has no effect on your existing data sharing consents.
You have successfully installed a new plugin.
How should this consent be named?
What type of consent do you want to create?
I want to share data with other MIDATA account holders.
I want to share data with a health professional.
I do not know yet to whom I want to share the data. Please add a passcode to this consent that I can give to a health professional.
With which persons(s) is data shared?
Select person that shares its data
The persons authorized by this consent may create or update data in your account covered by this consent.
The persons authorized by this consent may reshare the data I gave them access to.
Do not share data created after:
What data do you want to share?
This consent is empty at the beginning. You can select the data you want to share with this consent afterwards.
With which persons(s) do you want to share data?
Does not share data created after:
This consent does not share any data at the moment.
This consent shares data with other MIDATA account holders.
This consent shares data with healthcare professionals.
This consent shares data with research for use in a study.
This consent shares research data to a study participant.
This consent shares data with a mobile app or external service.
This implicitely created consent shares messages with their receivers.
This consent is expired. Data is no longer shared.
This consent needs confirmation by its owner.
This consent has been rejected by its owner.
Shares all records belonging to group: {{ group }}
Excluded are records belonging to group: {{ group }}
Using consents you can grant others (healthcare professionals, friends, researchers, ...) access to some of your data. Use this page to manage your consents and create new ones.
Show consents where you share data with someone else
Show consents where data is shared with you
There are {{ count }} consent(s) sharing data with you:
Please use the 'share' and 'unshare' buttons to select which records you want to share with consent
This consent currently shares data with
on the 'delete' button to the right of the record.
In order to permanently delete all records of a certain category, double click on the 'delete all' button to the right of the category.
The record tree for this selection cannot be created. There are too many consents involved.
requests the permission to access your personal data.
App may share data it has access to to third parties.
Your name and email address may be searched by other people using this app.
Please confirm the activation of the application using the MIDATA portal, then retry. Consent title is: {{ consent }}
Manage your health data. Enter new data and visualize existing data.
Share your data with friends. Communicate with people sharing your health situation. Motivate yourself by competition with others.
Participate in studies. Inform yourself about current research.
Share data with your doctor. Search for health professionals.
There are no new records. Visit the records page to browser all of your records.
Other MIDATA account holders may share their data with you.
Ask others to add you to their circles.
Create Circles to share your data with others. Share with friends, family or others.
Search for healthcare providers and add them to your list in order to share data with them.
Newest records from your healthcare providers
If you want to participate in research, configure your research settings. You will be contacted in this tile if you match a studies requirements.
Search for new health research publications.
Please fill out the surveys I shared with your account.
No contacts can be added to this circle.
All found users are already members of this circle.
Add As Individual People To Consent
Add As Changing Team To Consent
Connect your apps to collect data
Signed contract needs to be confirmed
Email not yet confirmed by user
There are no apps or plugins yet.

To avoid longer waiting time until your account is validated please fill out contact person and purpose of registration carefully such that an administrator may decide quickly about your access request.
There are no test users registered for this account.
Using these buttons you can register additional users for testing your plugins. By test users, plugins are run locally (from 'localhost') and not on the server.
There are no app specfic messages defined yet.
Registration of a new user by someone else
First use of app (if no registration email sent)
Login email changed (send to old email address)
Login email changed (send to new email address)
During development, you can test the plugin code stored on your local computer on this instance.
If your plugin offers automatic import, you can test the script of your plugin that is normally run on the server on your local computer.
Upload and manage the icons and images to be used with your application. Provide images for the login screen, the app store, the consent acceptation screen, etc.
Provide your own email texts sent to new user accounts, on first use of your application, for accepting consents and more.
View statistics and hints for improvements about the various types of API calls your application sends to the server.
Login as app and test queries against the MIDATA backend.
Only a MIDATA administrator may change this section. Please request changes if required.
This name is internally used to identify your app. Should be a valid identifier (a-z, A-Z, 0-9, _).
Is your app for a specific role only? Otherwise choose 'Any Role'.

Choose 'Plugin' if your app will run as MIDATA portal plugin. Choose 'Mobile App' for an external application. Choose 'OAuth1 Import' or 'OAuth2 Import' if you need to connect to an external server using OAuth1 or OAuth2.
The name of your app or plugin that will be presented to the end user.
A description of your plugin that will also be shown on the marked place.
Default is client_id=<client_id>&grant_type=<grant_type>&code=<code>&redirect_uri=<redirect_uri> but some services also require client_secret=<client_secret> or no client_id
App is allowed to reshare data it has access to to 3rd party.
Users of the app are allowed to search for other users of the same app.
Title of the tile for your plugin on the dashboard.
Categories on MISTORE for which your plugin should be listed.
URL of your plugins main page. If you use the template from MIDATA it is 'dist/index.html#?authToken=:authToken''
URL of your plugins dashboard tile. Leave empty if you do not provide such a tile.
Choose 'me' for the default dashboard. Choose 'config' if you write an import plugin.

Filter restricting the access of the app to the data. Access must be restricted by 'code', 'content' or 'group' and may be restricted by 'format' or 'owner'. Valid example (all Observations): '{ "group" : "all", "group-system" : "v1", "format" : ["fhir/Observation" ] }'

Filter restricting the access of the plugin to the data. Access must be restricted by at least one of 'code', 'content', 'group', 'format' or 'owner'. Valid example (all Observations): '{ "format" : ["fhir/Observation" ] }'

Look for valid values for 'code', 'content' or 'format' on the 'Format/Content' list of the developer guide. As a first version you may start with access to all data. For that use { "group" : "all", "group-system" : "v1" }. Please refine the filter before the plugin or the app goes in production.
Your app will need this 'secret' during login. Choose whatever you like.
User must participate in study in order to use app.
If filled out, this code must be entered by the user in order to sign up or log in the first time to MIDATA using the app. The code is not case sensitive.
Under development - to be used by developer only
Deprecated - should no longer be used
App/Plugin may only access data of the user logged in.
App/Plugin may only access data created using this app or plugin.
Add all data types written by the app automatically to the Data Access Filter. (MUST be turned off before app goes productive)
During development allow to access all data of the user. (MUST be replaced with a proper Data Access Filter before plugin goes productive)
Export the definition of this application, so that it can be imported and used on another server.
Number of times the action has been invoked.
Number of times operations had to be repeated because of concurrency issues.
Average number of internal database (MongoDB) queries executed per action invocation.
No information has been recorded since debug information was last cleared.
Please resize and compress the image to a reasonable size before upload. Images larger than 1 MB will not be accepted.
The menu above contains these links:
Your personal dashboard, where you can place whatever functionality you need most.
An overview over all functions provided by the MIDATA platform.
Configure your dashboard and data imports.
News and announcements about MIDATA, the platform and research projects
Some ideas to start with MIDATA:
In order to get started we recommend that you answer us some questions. We will preconfigure your account based on your answers.
Thank you for answering the setup questions! You sould visit your dashboard now or change your answers if you need to.
The answers to the following questions are only used to setup your account according to your needs.
Which measures do you want to view in the portal?
Do use any of these devices?
You can always come back and change these settings by visiting the "Help" page.
You do not have any circles.
No MIDATA members share data with you.
You do not participate in any study.
Join a research study by entering a participation code.
Join a study by entering a code:
You do not have a registered contact to a healthcare provider.
Your account has been set up for participation in a study. Functionality is limited. You may upgrade your user account to a full account.
Your account has been registered by an external application. Functionality is limited. You may upgrade your user account to a full account.
You are a member of the MIDATA cooperative.
You have a full user account but you are no member of the MIDATA cooperative.
By clicking on the 'Request Contract' button the contract and AGB will be sent to you by letter. Please return the signed AGB to convert this trial account into a full account.
The AGB and contract have been requested by you. Your request has not been processed by the MIDATA office yet.
The AGB and contract have been requested by you and should arrive during the next days.
Your postal address has been confirmed.
The letter sent to you contains a registration code. Please enter your code here once you have received it:
Your email address has not been validated yet. Please click on the link in the validation email you received!
Want to help studies by sharing your data?
You are not part of a team.
No studies have been created yet for your organisation.

After the study has been validated, you can link plugins and external data processing services to it. These plugins or services must connect to MIDATA using the credentials of one of the members of the research team with sufficient rights.
Application shares data with participant group(s)
This setup cannot be changed anymore after Study has been validated.
, reveals anonymized ID, year of birth, gender and country
Anonym: Pseudonymization mapping may not be accessed.
, requests member to share full name, birthday and contact Information (address, phone, email)
- the MIDATA member needs assistance of a health professional.
No groups of participants have been defined yet.
Only the first 1000 matching consents are shown.
This study does not have any participants matching your search criteria yet.
Accept all requests and assign new participants to participant group
Accept all participation requests and assign new participants to the selected group as soon as the research application linked to this study connects.
Once data is available it can be downloaded here.
This setup cannot be changed anymore after Study has been validated.

If the study Terms and Conditions have to be read and accepted by the user, please send the text to MIDATA. We will upload the text in the correct format and provide you with the ID you need to enter here.
A new researcher has been added to your organization.
A new participant has been added to your study.

You may change your own rights by readding yourself to the team with different rights. You may only do this as long as you are the only team member. You can't deprive yourself of the right to manage the team.
The study name will be shown to participants. The description will be available on the portal and during app login.

If more people are involved in carrying out the study, provide all involved persons and their role. As long as you have not added more people, you can change your own role by adding yourself again with another role.
Your study may have one or multiple groups of participants. Please define the list of participant groups.
Your study has to explicitely state which data of the participants it will access. The Data Access Filter cannot be changed after study has been validated.
Start and end date will be shown to the participants. No data will flow into the study from the moment the data is frozen.
If the study Terms and Conditions have to be confirmed online by the participants, please contact MIDATA.
Validation will be done by MIDATA after it has been requested. The study may no longer be changed after validation has been requested.
Please wait until study has been validated.

You can link plugins and external data processing services to your study. These may read the participants' data and/or share aggregated data back to the participants. These plugins or services must connect to MIDATA using the credentials of one of the members of the research team with sufficient rights.
App has been linked with study
To link an application to your study, please send to MIDATA the code of your study and the name of the application you want to have linked.
As long as participant search is not started it is not possible to participate to the study. Apps which require study participation may not be used.
Marks this study as officially started.
Participants assigned to groups and accepted
New participants must be assigned to a participant group and be accepted or rejected.
No new participants may be recruited after participant search has ended.
When the study is ended data are immediately frozen. The data stay available for download.
Export the study data as FHIR JSON Bundle (separate for each participant group).
